channel.title: Planet of the Lost on Jeff Russell's Webstead
channel.description: Recent content in Planet of the Lost on Jeff Russell's Webstead

item.title: Planet of the Lost
item.description: So, this is just a quick post on the alternate game we’ve now played for our last two sessions: Planet of the Lost. The basic idea is that our characters were all on a flight from Nairobi to London and it crashed under mysterious circumstances in the desert. We all figured we were in the Sahara at first, but it’s quickly becoming clear that something much weirder is going on.
